articles.title: Apple Announced A New iOS Software Release With A Bunch Of Cool Features - Hit 107
articles.description: Gimme!!
articles.content:
Apple has given us a quick peek into their latest software release and we are downright excited to get our hands on it.
The upcoming operating system, iOS 14, is set to offer a bunch of new features… [+1937 chars]
